name: CopyPix
description:
Welcome to CopyPIx!

This game is made just for you to relax doing pixel art by moving boxes.

There is no goal. You exit the level only when you want to.

This game was made for LOWREZJAM 2022 (https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam-2022)

Currently, the level editor is not available but it will be in another update (it's kinda janky right now).

I will release some level packs and add sounds in the future.

HOW TO PLAY :

To move use the arrow keys. 
Press space to select a level.
Press escape to exit a level and select another.
